Here’s how to call your group friend… [+2395 chars]

articles.title: Waiting for the triple product launch & spec reveal by OnePlus on 28th April? Here’s how to watch the lau - Times of India
articles.description: Spotlight News: Buzz has it that OnePlus fans are going gaga over the upcoming ‘More Power To You’ launch that’s taking place on the 28th of April! The launch is aime
